attributes.action: Regulate the car mechanics industry and set up an Ombudsman in order to make customers less vulnerable to over priced and false information regarding the servicing of their vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Car mechanics at the present time have no regulation; except via trading standards. I propose that all car mechanics working as a professional in this industry are regulated similar to how health professions are regulated. This would help prevent unneccesary maintenance and charges on repairs; in addition to making the industry more accountable, trustworthy and reduce the risk of exploiting vulnerable customers.
